    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Cannon Corner Shot](/Feats.aspx?ID=3225) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 129</row>

**Archetype** [Artillerist](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=115)

</column>

---

By loading special ammunition in a particular way, you can make your [siege weapons](/equipment/siege-weapons) do all manner of tricks that other siege engineers can barely even imagine. If you personally contribute an additional [Load](/Rules.aspx?ID=1624) action to the siege weapon's loading, above the minimum, you can change a burst into a line twice as long as the size of the burst, or vice versa (so a 10-foot burst turns into a 20-foot line, or a 20-foot line turns into a 10-foot burst).
name: Cannon Corner Shot
